attributes.action:
MR BATES VS POST OFFICE 
ALAN BATES TO BECOME LORD ALAN BATES
attributes.background: Mr BATES has provided himself to be loyal to the Crown and rules of law and shown a true British spirit   and defender of the innocent and gave them justice

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments. This includes requests for peerages.

You can find out how people are appointed to the House of Lords here: https://www.parliament.uk/about/mps-and-lords/about-lords/lords-appointment/
